title: Bunny, Leave The Door Open Tonight - Novel Updates
tags: Childhood Friends   Cute Protagonist   Cute Story   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hiding True Identity   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Naive Protagonist   R-18   Secret Identity   S*x Friends   Writers
author: 묘묘희
description:
Sweet Pea, a romance writer who writes pure and sparkling stories.

One day, she saw a book that sold well in the dark. She became curious about the unfamiliar love affair scenes within this best selling book.

“Is it possible to use it if I try it myself?”

Sweet Pea, who published an advertisement for ‘recruiting sex partners’ in the newspaper, declared this to her best friend Edward…….

“I’m going to make a sex partner!”

“…….What kind of partner are you going to make?”  

Edward furrowed his brows in disbelief at Sweet Pea’s words.

Thinking he would never allow another man to covet her.

‘I’d rather it be me as her partner.’

And he visited Sweet Pea in the name of ‘De Niro’ wearing a specially made mask…….

‘What a cute bunny!’

It was to chastise her for being such a lovely bunny.

The man’s rabbit hunting begins.

Bunny, leave the door open tonight!>
